data.title: Fayette Co., AL: 1860 Mortality Schedule
data.text:
Fayette County, Alabama

~ 1860 Mortality Schedule ~

I thought this information may be of help to some researchers who are having trouble finding their relatives in the 1860 Fayette Co., AL, Census. These people died in Fayette County between July 1, 1859, and June 30, 1860. I've listed all the information available for each person. ~ Monya Havekost
